summary: Special Education Department. Teacher & Psychologist position for children with special needs emotionally and educationally. My major duties are to co-operating with teachers, parents, speech therapist and teachers to organize and implement individual educational programs. My personal goals for Children with special needs is to provide them with the necessary support and resources to reach their full potential and lead fulfilling and meaningful lives in all respects.
Provided counseling services to individuals, couples, and families.
Helped people make decisions about their family planning, their relationships, adopting children etc.
